comment.text: The translation key "CopySharedLink" is used to display a button that allows users to copy a shared link in public rooms, typically found on a settings or options page within the application. The label and icon displayed will be localized for each language. It appears as a button with an icon and a tooltip that provides the label when hovered over.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Paylaşılan linki nüsxələyin' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural. A more idiomatic translation would be preferred.

The translation 'Kopírování sdíleného odkazu' is a bit literal and clunky. It translates to 'Copying of a shared link'. A more natural translation would be 'Sdílený odkaz' or 'Zkopírovat sdílený odkaz'.

The translation "Αντιγραφή κοινόχρηστου συνδέσμου" is a literal translation and not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Copy shared link' in Greek. 'Κοινόχρηστου' is grammatically correct but sounds a bit formal and less user-friendly in this context.
While not strictly incorrect, the separation of 'συνδέσμου' and 'κοινής χρήσης' is less common. A slightly more integrated phrasing improves readability.

While technically correct, 'Kopioi jaettu linkki' is slightly awkward. A more natural Finnish phrasing would be 'Jaa linkki' or 'Kopioi linkki'. 'Jaettu linkki' emphasizes the sharing aspect which isn't always the focus.

The translation "Պատճենել ընդհանուր հղումը" literally translates to "Copy general link". While understandable, it doesn't convey the nuance of a 'shared link'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the sharing aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Կիսել հղումը" (Share the link) or "Պատճենել կիսվող հղումը" (Copy the shareable link).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Skopiuj link udostępniania" is a bit verbose and doesn't quite capture the brevity of "Copy shared link". A more natural and concise translation would be preferred.

While "Copiere link partajat" is understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Romanian translation for 'Copy shared link' would be 'Copiere link comun' or 'Copiere legătură comună'. 'Partajat' implies 'shared' in a more active sense, like 'shared between people', whereas 'comun' is a better fit for a link shared for general access.

The translation 'බෙදාගත් සබැඳියේ පිටපතක්' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally as it could. It translates to 'a copy of the shared link'.  'Copy shared link' is more of an action, 'Copy' is the verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'සබැඳිය බෙදාගන්න' (sabaḍiya bedāgānna) which means 'Share link' or 'Copy link' depending on context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of 'සබැඳියේ' (sabaḍiyē) could be improved depending on the register.  'සබැඳුම' (sabaḍuma) referring to the link itself might be more suitable in some contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider re-evaluating the phrasing based on the overall tone of the UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Копирај дељени линк' is understandable, a more natural and common phrasing would be 'Копирај сподељени линк'. 'Дељени' can be used, but 'сподељени' is more typical in this context.
